short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly access relevant information for selected word

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "InfoSE," the ultimate extension for lightning-fast access to relevant information right at your fingertips. With InfoSE, effortlessly explore top relevant results for selected word, neatly organized within accordion-style panels, each offering a concise summary for quick insights.

Key Features:
Effortless Access: Simply highlight any word or phrase on your browser, and InfoSE springs into action, fetching relevant information instantaneously.

Accordion Interface: InfoSE presents search results in a sleek accordion format, allowing you to expand and collapse each panel effortlessly. This intuitive design enables efficient browsing without cluttering your screen.

Comprehensive Summaries: Dive into succinct summaries within each accordion panel, providing essential details without overwhelming you with excessive information. Whether it's definitions, explanations, or background context, InfoSE delivers the highlights at a glance.

Wikipedia Integration: Seamlessly explore Wikipedia entries directly within InfoSE. With a single click, delve into comprehensive articles, gaining in-depth understanding on your chosen topic without leaving your browsing session.
